title: Drying - 1 / 4
instruction: Bring the chicken to the room temperature and pat dry the chicken with a paper towel

title: Mixing - 2 / 4
instruction: Mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper

title: Sprinkling - 3 / 4
instruction: Sprinkle the mixture all over the chicken

title: Grilling - 4 / 4
instruction: Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes
